task.title: Configuring static IP address for Maestro VM deployed in VMware vCloud

context.p: This procedure provides instructions on how to configure the static IP address for the Maestro VM deployed in VMware vCloud.

prereq.p: Before beginning this procedure, ensure that you are logged in to VCD.
To configure the static IP address:

step.cmd: Click the My Cloud tab and then click the VMs tab.
Right-click the Maestro VM, select Properties and then select Hardware.
From the IP Mode drop-down list, select Static - Manual and then select IP Address.
In the IP Address field, enter your static IP address and click OK.
